pitch.cc: That was pitch number 15 for Mitchell Boggs; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .226 average in the first 15 pitches but they hit .357 off him after that.
Mitchell Boggs is taking a chance challenging Ronny Cedeno in a location where he is hitting .444 for the season compared to .216 overall.
